questions.question: THIS IS THE ONLY RESTAURANT WITH CHARACTER BREAKFAST IN ANIMAL KINGDOM.
FOR A QUICK GRAB-AND-GO BREAKFAST IN THE MAGIC KINGDOM, PICK UP YOUR STARBUCKS HERE.
questions.answer: What is the Main Street Bakery?

questions.question: AT BREAKFAST AT KONA CAFE, BE SURE TO HAVE THIS DECADENT ALLITERATIVE SPECIAL.
THESE TWO ANTHROPOMORPHIZED BREAKFAST FOODS CRACKED CORNY JOKES IN KITCHEN KABARET.
YOU CAN SWOON OVER FLYNN RIDER AT THE CHARACTER BREAKFAST AT THIS RESORT RESTAURANT.
YOU CAN GET A VARIETY OF AFRICAN-INSPIRED DISHES HERE, BUT THE BREAD SERVICE MIGHT BE FILLING ENOUGH FOR LUNCH.
THESE TWO ATTRACTIONS SIT ABOVE THE LUNCHING PAD IN TOMORROWLAND.
questions.answer: What are the Astro Orbiter and the TTA PeopleMover?

questions.question: LUNCH CAN COME WITH AFTERNOON TEA AT THE GARDEN VIEW TEA ROOM AT THIS RESORT.
questions.answer: What is the Grand Floridian Resort and Spa?

questions.question: THE FIRST ONE OF THESE OPENED IN 2004 IN WHAT WAS THEN-DOWNTOWN DISNEY; IT’S NAMED FOR THE INVENTOR OF A CLASSIC LUNCH FOOD.
HAVE LUNCH WITH AN IMAGINEER IN THE BAMBOO ROOM OF THIS RESTAURANT.
questions.answer: What is the Hollywood Brown Derby?

questions.question: STITCH MUST HAVE STOPPED AT CASEY’S FOR ONE OF THESE AS A SNACK IN BETWEEN ESCAPES.
THIS DINOSAUR MAY WANT TO MAKE A SNACK OUT OF TWELVE WANDERING TIME TOURISTS.
NOT SURE IF IT QUALIFIES AS A SNACK, A DESSERT, OR A MEAL, BUT THE KITCHEN SINK SUNDAE AT THIS ICE CREAM SHOP PROBABLY HAS MORE CALORIES THAN YOU SHOULD EAT IN A WEEK.
questions.answer: What is Beaches and Cream Soda Shop?

questions.question: PONGU PONGU IN PANDORA IS THE ONLY PLACE TO GET THIS POPULAR PINEAPPLE SPRING ROLL SNACK.
FOR A VERY LIMITED TIME, YOU COULD SNACK ON POOP BROWNIES FROM THIS ANIMAL KINGDOM LOCATION.
BREAKFAST AND LUNCH HERE ARE QUICK-SERVICE, BUT THE DINING ROOM PROUDLY PRESENTS YOUR DINNER AS TABLE SERVICE.
IF DISNEY’S SIGNATURE DINING OPTIONS AREN’T EXPENSIVE ENOUGH FOR YOU, SIT DOWN TO A PRICEY DINNER AT THIS AAA FIVE DIAMOND RESTAURANT.
AFTER THE RELEASE OF LILO AND STITCH, THE POLYNESIAN LUAU WAS RENAMED TO THIS, AND INCORPORATED A SONG FROM THE FILM.
questions.answer: What is Disney’s Spirit of Aloha Dinner Show?

questions.question: THE OUTDOOR DINNER SHOW AT FORT WILDERNESS.
THESE TWO ALLITERATIVE RESTAURANTS WILL SERVE YOU DINNER MADE WITH FOOD THAT IS CULTIVATED INSIDE THE SAME EPCOT PAVILION WHERE THEY ARE HOUSED.
questions.answer: What are Sunshine Seasons and the Garden Grill?

questions.question: THIS ATTRACTION WAS MOVED FROM ITS ORIGINAL LOCATION AND DOUBLED ITS RIDE CAPACITY FOR PEANUTS.
questions.answer: What is Dumbo the Flying Elephant?

questions.question: WITH ALL THESE FOOD QUESTIONS, YOU MIGHT WANT TO LOOK INTO GETTING THIS ON YOUR NEXT VACATION TO WALT DISNEY WORLD.
questions.answer: What is the Disney Dining Plan?

questions.question: WHILE GETTING SOME ICE CREAM ON MAIN STREET, OFFER SOME TO THESE CHARACTERS.
AN HOMAGE TO THIS SLOW MOVING EASY-TO-DIGEST ATTRACTION CAN BE FOUND ON THE DD BATTERIES LOCATED IN THE QUEUE OF THE ATTRACTION THAT REPLACED IT.
DO US ONE BETTER AND ANSWER THIS QUESTION WITH WHY IS THIS MARVEL CINEMATIC CHARACTER?
THE ORIGINAL EPCOT ICON FOR THIS PAVILION CAN BE FOUND IN THE MIDDLE OF THE GRAVITY WHEEL IN MISSION: SPACE.
WHILE WALKING IN THE VILLAGE, THIS FORMER MAELSTROM HIGHLIGHT CAN BE FOUND IN A FRAME.
A NAUTILUS CAN BE SEEN IN THE TREE OUTSIDE OF THIS ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What is The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh?

questions.question: THIS CHARACTER SURVIVED HIS ENCOUNTER, BUT THEN BECAME A LEVEL 1 CRIMINAL.
MOST OF THE ANIMATRONICS ON THE ZIP-A-DEE LADY ARE FROM THIS FORMER ATTRACTION.
KITCHEN KABARET
questions.answer: What is Soarin’ Around the World?

questions.question: SUPERSTAR TELEVISION
SOUNDS DANGEROUS
questions.answer: What is Path of the Jedi?

questions.question: MISSION TO MARS (IN MAGIC KINGDOM)
SUPERSTAR LIMO
questions.answer: What is Monsters Inc. Mike & Sully to the Rescue?

questions.question: DISNEY-MGM STUDIOS HAD THIS MANY ATTRACTIONS ON OPENING DAY.
THIS WAS THE FIRST NEW ATTRACTION ADDED AFTER OPENING DAY.
questions.answer: What is the Indiana Jones Epic Stunt Spectacular?

questions.question: YOU COULD VISIT THIS BAKERY ON OPENING DAY; IT FINALLY CLOSED LAST YEAR.
YOU COULD GRAB A COCKTAIL HERE ON OPENING DAY; SOON YOU’LL NEED TO PAY $33,000 TO HAVE A DRINK IN THE SAME LOCATION.
THIS STREETMOSPHERE CHARACTER, WHO IS ALSO PROPRIETOR OF A SHOP NEAR THE PARK’S ENTRANCE, PERFORMED IN THE PARK FROM ITS OPENING UNTIL 2005.
POP CENTURY FALLS WITHIN THIS RESORT AREA.
questions.answer: What is the Wide World of Sports Resort area?

questions.question: POP’S THREE POOLS INCLUDE THE HIPPY-DIPPY POOL, THE COMPUTER POOL, AND A POOL SHAPED LIKE THIS.
THE YEAR POP CENTURY OPENED.
WHILE THE EXISTING BUILDINGS ARE DEDICATED TO THE “CLASSIC YEARS” OF THE 1950S-1990S, THE BUILDINGS DEDICATED TO THESE YEARS, THE 1900S-1940S, WERE NEVER FINISHED.
POP CENTURY’S FOOD COURT IS KNOWN FOR THIS DESSERT - IT’S THE ONLY PLACE IN WALT DISNEY WORLD THAT SERVES IT.
NATHAN RODE THIS CLASSIC FANTASYLAND ATTRACTION THREE TIMES ON HIS FIRST TRIP TO WDW. THANKFULLY HE MADE IT BACK FROM NEVERLAND.
THIS IS NATHAN’S FAVORITE RESORT, DESPITE THE FACT THAT THE BEATLES BROKE UP THERE.
NATHAN’S FIRST EXPERIENCE ON THIS HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS RIDE HAD HIM IN A COLD SWEAT, NOT BECAUSE HE WAS SCARED, BUT BECAUSE HE HAD A FEVER YET REFUSED TO LEAVE TILL THE DAY WAS DONE.
IN 1994, NATHAN GOT TO ENJOY THIS RIDE ON IT’S LAST YEAR OF OPERATION.
questions.answer: What is 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea?

questions.question: THIS DISNEY PARKS SHOW WAS A FAVORITE OF YOUNG NATHAN AND RAN FROM 1990-96 STARRING THE DISNEY AFTERNOON TV LINE-UP AND THE MOUSE HIMSELF.
questions.answer: What is Mickey’s Magical TV World?

questions.question: AMERICA SAILS ACROSS THE SKY AFTER SPREADING HER GOLDEN WINGS ON THIS.
IN FANTASMIC! YOU WILL FIND THESE TYPES OF VISIONS LEADING TO STRANGE AND WONDROUS DREAMS.
IN RIVERS OF LIGHT, “WE ARE ONE” WITH THESE BODIES OF WATER.
THIS IS WHERE THE BIRDS ARE GONNA WIND UP IF THE TIKI ROOM SHOW DOESN’T FILL YOU WITH PLEASURE AND GLEE.
IN THE COUNTRY BEAR JAMBOREE, BROTHER TED IS ON THE CORN JUG AND THIS OTHER INSTRUMENT HE PLAYS WITH THE HANDLE OF A HOE.
THE MALEFICENT DRAGON FLOAT FROM THIS PARADE CAUGHT FIRE.
questions.answer: What is the Festival of Fantasy parade?

questions.question: YOU WON’T HEAR “KETCHUP!” IN THIS RESTAURANT ANYMORE.
THIS RESORT WAS RECENTLY STRUCK BY LIGHTNING.
questions.answer: What is Disney’s Yacht Club Resort?

questions.question: TOM’S NOT THE ONLY THING FROM FLORIDA THAT’S GOING TO PARIS. IT WAS ANNOUNCED THAT THIS ATTRACTION WILL BE COPIED ACROSS THE POND.
DEADPOOL OVERTOOK MARVEL IN THE WEEKEND BOX OFFICE STANDINGS, BUT BOTH FILMS FEATURE THIS ACTOR.

final-jeopardy.answer: What is the red T-shirt and brown pants?
final-jeopardy.question: IN THIS INFAMOUS PICTURE, THESE ARE THE ONLY TWO PARTS THAT WERE ACTUALLY SAVED FROM THE ATTRACTION.
